source:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_00This dismayed maiden has a horrifying story to tell about the Gold Saucer.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ウルダハの怯えた様子の女性は、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_01Still trembling from her brush with the paranormal, a dismayed maiden tells you the Gold Saucer is now host to spirits from beyond. Fearing such a disturbance could force the establishment to close down, she pleads with you to seek out Godbert Manderville, owner of the Gold Saucer, and lend him your aid to deal with this otherworldly threat.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

怯えた女性の話によると、現在ゴールドソーサーでは得体の知れないものが徘徊しているようだ。詳細な話を聞くため、ゴールドソーサーの「ゴッドベルト」のもとに向かおう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_02<tab>Godbert offers you a warm welcome, but quickly takes note of your grave expression. He wastes no time in telling you what he knows of the apparitions that have taken residence in the Saucer. Though he has yet to attain an accurate description of them, his staff claim they were last seen at Event Square.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_02<tab>ゴッドベルトから、謎の白い物体の詳細を聞いた。「イベントスクウェア」で、目撃情報を探そう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_03<tab>A nearby patron, seemingly down on his luck, tells you of his plan to catch, not ghosts, but faeries he claims are hiding in the Saucer. He claims to have seen them heading in the direction of Wonder Square.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_03<tab>一攫千金を狙う男に、謎の白い物体の目撃情報を聞いた。謎の白い物体は、どうやら逃げてしまったらしい。「ワンダースクウェア」で目撃情報を探そう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_04<tab>You find yet another patron whose story is more confusing than the last. He claims to have seen a pair of balloons traversing the halls toward Round Square in a rather lively fashion.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_04<tab>テルビ・ケスルビに、謎の白い物体の目撃情報を聞いた。謎の白い物体は、少し前に目撃されたらしい。「ラウンドスクウェア」で謎の白い物体らしきものを探そう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_05<tab>As you enter Round Square, you see a most unexpected sight. Not ghosts, faeries, or balloons, but moogles. Perhaps now you can ascertain the truth behind the Gold Saucer's troubles.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_05<tab>2匹のモーグリを発見した。「お年頃モーグリ」に話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_06<tab>The moogles were, in fact, the otherworldly creatures that had both patrons and staff in a panic. Taking a keen interest in cultures other than their own, they could not resist the temptation of a festival at the Gold Saucer. They soon rush off to Entrance Square to apologize for the trouble they have caused.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_06<tab>騒動の原因が、モーグリたちだと判明した。「ゴッドベルト」に真実を伝えよう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_07<tab>You return to Entrance Square, the moogles in tow. Thankfully Godbert is not angry for their presence─far from it. He considers the moogles to be honored guests, and intends to waive away the recent happenings at the Saucer as part of the festival. He then takes his leave to inform the staff of their arrival, so that they may enjoy a day of mirth and merriment.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SEQ_07<tab>ゴッドベルトと話し、事態の収束を約束された。お年頃モーグリは、冒険者の協力に感謝しているようだ。ゴールドソーサー・フェスティバルを楽しみながら、モーグリたちを見守ってあげよう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Godbert.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_00<tab>ゴールドソーサーのゴッドベルトと話す

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_01<tab>Search Event Square for signs of a disturbance.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_01<tab>イベントスクウェアで謎の物体を見かけた人を探す

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_02<tab>Search Wonder Square for signs of a disturbance.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_02<tab>ワンダースクウェアで謎の物体を見かけた人を探す

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_03<tab>Survey Round Square at the destination specified for signs of a disturbance.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_03<tab>ラウンドスクウェアの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA9D201 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_04<tab>Speak to the moogle suitor.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_04<tab>お年頃モーグリと話す

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_05<tab>Report to Godbert.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_05<tab>ゴッドベルトに報告

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TODO_06<tab>

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_000<tab>Ahhh! Please, stay away!
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_000きゃああ！　こないで！
あっちへいって！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_001<tab>Oh, forgive me, I...I had a rather frightful experience at the Gold Saucer not long ago. Only now have I managed to catch my breath from running.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_001あ……ごめんなさいね、大きな声をだして。
さっきゴールドソーサーで恐ろしい目にあって、
大慌てで逃げ帰ってきたところなものだから……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_002<tab>As I was making for Wonder Square, I was assaulted by a pair of ghastly white creatures careening down the hallway. I glimpsed them but only for a moment before they vanished into thin air!
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_002わたし、見ちゃったのよ……。
白くて小さなものが、ふらふらと空中を漂っているのを……。
しかも、突然に消えたり、現れたり……本当に不気味だったわ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_003<tab>I'm convinced the place is haunted. No doubt the poor souls of gamblers who lost one too many turns of Cuff-a-Cur.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_003あれはきっと、
トリプルトライアドやチョコボレースで負けた人たちの、
怨念が寄り集まった生霊よ……！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_004<tab>Judging by your dress, I take it you're an adventurer, am I right? Please, you must go and purge the Gold Saucer of those spirits. With such frightful specters lurking about, it could spell the end of the establishment as we know it.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_004あなたのいで立ち……もしかして冒険者かしら？
お願いよ、あの生霊を退治して！
騒動が収まらないと、怖くて遊びにいけないわ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_005<tab>Even as we speak, Lord Manderville is doing all he can to get the situation under control, but I fear he is at his wit's end. You must hurry, before it is too late.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_005ゴールドソーサーにいる「ゴッドベルト」さんも、
この事態の収拾に、てんてこ舞いになっていたようよ。
彼から話を聞いてみたら、いいんじゃないかしら。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_006<tab>If you've yet to visit the Gold Saucer, you will need a ticket for admission. Perhaps you could try speaking with that young man over there. He's been gloating of his winnings and seems to be in a generous mood. Perhaps you can persuade him to offer you one.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_006もしゴールドソーサーに行ったことがないのなら、
そこの「羽振りのいい若者」に声をかけてみて。
彼、気前がいいみたいだから、チケットをくれると思うわ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the quest “It Could Happen to You,” which can be undertaken at level 15.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_007本クエストを進行するには、ウルダハ：ナル回廊にて、
レベル15から受注できるクエスト「いざ、魅惑の遊技場へ」を、
受注している必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_007<tab>Lord Manderville is likely at the Gold Saucer deliberating on how to rid the Gold Saucer of its otherworldly infestation. Please, you must help him.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_007支配人の「ゴッドベルト」さんなら、
ゴールドソーサーにいたわよ。
詳しい話は、彼から聞いてみたらいいんじゃないかしら。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_008<tab>If you've yet to visit the Gold Saucer, you will need a ticket for admission. Perhaps you could try speaking with that young man over there. He's been gloating of his winnings and seems to be in a generous mood. Perhaps you can persuade him to offer you one.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_FRIGHTENEDWOMAN03133_000_008あなた、ゴールドソーサーに行ったことがないのね？
そこの「羽振りのいい若者」に声をかけてみるといいわ。
彼、気前がいいみたいだから、チケットをくれるはずよ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the quest “It Could Happen to You,” which can be undertaken at level 15.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_009本クエストを進行するには、ウルダハ：ナル回廊にて、
レベル15から受注できるクエスト「いざ、魅惑の遊技場へ」を、
受注している必要があります。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_010<tab>Well, well, if it isn't my beloved son's faithful companion, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I presume it was word of our festival that guided your steps to the Gold Saucer?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_010これは、息子の友人)) (( )) 02 /var>殿ではありませんか！
ゴールドソーサー・フェスティバル開催の折、
足を運んでくださったようですな！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_011<tab>I remember you. Yes, the <var 08 E905 ((lovely lady)) ((strapping gentleman)) /var> with the strong-yet-tender fingers─<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I presume it was word of our festival that guided your steps to the Gold Saucer?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_011これは、油塗りの達人、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿ではありませんか！
ゴールドソーサー・フェスティバル開催の折、
足を運んでくださったようですな！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_012<tab>Ah, an adventurer. And well traveled judging by your garb. I presume it was word of our festival that guided your steps to the Gold Saucer this day?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_012どうやら、冒険者の方とお見受けいたしますぞ。
ゴールドソーサー・フェスティバル開催の折、
足を運んでくださったようですな！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_013<tab>Hmmm. No, your stern expression would suggest business of some other sort. No doubt it was the rumors of apparitions haunting the Gold Saucer, then.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_013いや、その様子からすると、
例の不気味な噂を聞きつけてきたのではありませんかな？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_014<tab>Then perhaps your arrival will mark the end to our misfortune. Indeed, there is truth to the talebearings that brought you here. My staff have reported sightings of strange, ghost-like figures floating about the halls as recently as <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((this afternoon)) ((last night)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((this morning)) ((this afternoon)) /var>)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_014渡りに舟とはこのことかもしれませんな。
噂の通り、現在ゴールドソーサーでは、
白い謎の物体の目撃情報が相次いでいるのです。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_015<tab>They seem to vanish as quickly as they appear. As such, we have yet to ascertain an accurate description of these supposed spirits. But regardless of their appearance, both my staff and patrons are beside themselves with fright.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_015それは、見えたり消えたりする不可解なもので、
顔らしきものがあった、なんて噂までありましてな。
お客様も従業員も、怯えてしまっているのですぞ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_016<tab>These disturbances bode ill for the Gold Saucer. Might I call upon your assistance in sleuthing out the truth behind these sightings?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_016このままでは、ゴールドソーサーの評判にも関わります。
どうか、白い謎の物体の正体を暴くのを、
手伝ってはいただけませんかな？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_017<tab>They were last seen at Event Square, but there seems to be no rhyme nor reason to the comings and goings of these spirits. Tread lightly, my friend. These halls are not as safe as they once were.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_017従業員たちから話をきいたところ、
先ほど、「イベントスクウェア」で目撃情報があったようです。
まずはそちらで、聞き込みをお願いいたしますぞ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_018<tab>Whatever it is that stalks the halls of the Gold Saucer, it never lingers about in the same location for long. I would suggest you make haste to Event Square 'ere they vanish again into the aether.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_018白い謎の物体に関する、目撃情報が入っておりますぞ。
「イベントスクウェア」で、聞き込みをしていただけますかな。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_020<tab>Spirits running about the Gold Saucer? I don't rightly know what they are, but I mean to catch them.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_020ああん？
あんたも、謎の物体を探してるのか？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_021<tab>Raising a chocobo for the races exhausted all of my savings, you see. But if I had those flying faeries or whatever they are, I could sell them to make up for my losses and then some.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_021俺は、競走羽の育成で、ずいぶん金をすっちまってな……。
あの謎の物体をとっ捕まえて、サーカスにでも売り払えば、
きっといい金になるはずなんだ……！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_022<tab>I've searched everywhere, from the Cuff-a-Curs to the Cactpot cashier counter, and nothing. I had considered giving up, but just as you arrived, I thought I saw something in the hallway here. ...You don't think they've gone off to Wonder Square, do you?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_022ここはずいぶん探したが、見つからないな。
もう「ワンダースクウェア」方面に逃げたのかもしれねぇ。
おい、もしあんたが見つけたら、俺にも分け前をくれよな！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_023<tab>If you find anything, you won't forget about me, will you? The man who tipped you off to the faeries' whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_LOSER03133_000_023あんたは「ワンダースクウェア」で、
他にも謎の物体を見かけたやつがいないか、探してくれよ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TELBIKESULBI_000_025<tab>Have I seen anything strange? Well, I thought I saw two white balloons floating down the hall─rather fancifully, mind you─toward Round Square. When I blinked they were gone. Likely my eyes playing tricks on me.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TELBIKESULBI_000_025白い謎の物体……？
そういえばさっき、目の前を通り過ぎていったよ。
「ラウンドスクウェア」のほうに向かったように見えたけど……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TELBIKESULBI_000_026<tab>I hate to change the subject, but... What do you think of the fragrance I'm wearing? My companion promised to meet me here, but she's nowhere to be seen! I fear my choice of aroma has driven her away.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TELBIKESULBI_000_026そんなことより、君は、僕の彼女を見なかった？
ここで待ち合わせしてるはずなんだけど、
いっこうに来ないんだ……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TELBIKESULBI_000_027<tab><sigh> Oh my dear, sweet, companion. Where ever could she be?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_TELBIKESULBI_000_027白い謎の物体なら、
「ラウンドスクウェア」のほうに向かったように見えたよ。
気になるなら、追いかけてみればいいんじゃないかな……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You eye what appears to be a pair of bickering moogles, the likely cause of panic and distress in the Gold Saucer. Perhaps you should speak with them and see why they have strayed so far from the Shroud.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_0302匹のモーグリを見つけた。
彼らが白い謎の物体の正体かもしれない。
話しかけて確認してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_031<tab>Hm? If I didn't know better, I'd swear this <var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var> was looking right at us. But that's silly. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> couldn't possibly see us... Could <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_031このヒト、じっとこっちを見てて怖いクポ……。
まさか、モグたちのこと見えてるクポ……？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_040<tab>Aaahhh! My sweet! This <var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var> is looking <var 1A 02 /var>right<var 1A 01 /var> at us. What do we do!?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_040ひいっ、ヒトが話しかけてきたクポ！
命ばかりはお助けクポー！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_041<tab>Settle down, my little pomkin. So long as you stay relaxed, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> can't possibly see us, kupo.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_041落ち着くクポ！
姿が見えなくなる魔法は、さっきかけ直したばかりクポ。
ヒトに姿が見えてるはずがないクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_042<tab>Yes... Yes, of course, kupo! As if any of these simpletons could possibly detect us. Hahaha.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_042そ、そうだったクポ……。
じゃあこのヒトがこっちを見ているのは、偶然クポね！
びっくりして損したクポー。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_Q1_000_000<tab>なんて声をかける？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_A1_000_001<tab>Actually, I can.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_A1_000_001<tab>見えてるよ

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_A1_000_002<tab>This <var 1A 02 /var>simpleton<var 1A 01 /var> is about to tear your pom off.
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_A1_000_002<tab>ポンポンむしり取るぞ

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_043<tab><gasp> You <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> see us!?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_043ク、クポ！？
なんで見えてるクポー！？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_044<tab>Gaaahhh! I-I didn't mean it. I swear! Please say you'll forgive me. Oh pretty please!
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_044クポオオオオオオ！？
お助けクポオオオオオオオオオオオオ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_045<tab>You must be that adventurer we've heard so much about, with the ability to perceive that which others cannot.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_045あ、あなたもしかして、モグたちのことが見える、
特別な冒険者さんクポ……！？
あたし、あなたのすごいお話、いっぱい聞いてるクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_046<tab>Ah! You're <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> adventurer? Oh my, this is such an honor. What business would the realm's greatest hero have with the likes of us?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_046す、すごいヒトクポ……！
そんなすごいヒトが、モグたちになにかお話があったクポ？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_047<tab>A pair of white specters appearing and disappearing all about the Gold Saucer? Oh dear, I fear the fault for everyone's fright falls with us. Allow me to explain.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_047見えたり消えたりする、白い物体クポ？
それは、きっとモグたちのことクポ……。
お話を聞いてほしいクポ……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_048<tab>My sugar plum and I have always had a great interest in the culture of your kind. When I heard about this place, and that it was holding a festival, I could think of no better place to court her.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_048モグたち、ヒトの文化に興味があって、
お祭りをやってるっていう、
ゴールドソーサーへデートにやってきたクポ……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_049<tab>
target: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_049<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_050<tab>But with all these lights, and music, and throngs of people─it was such a shock, we inadvertently made ourselves visible to everyone here. There was screaming and poking─some even tried to catch us like playthings, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_050でも、こんな賑やかなところ初めてだから、緊張しちゃって、
モグの姿を消す魔法がとけかかっていたみたいクポ……。
それで大勢に見つかって、驚かれたり、追いかけられたり……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_051<tab>We've been blinking about searching for a place to relax, and eventually made our way here.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_051怖くて怖くて、いっぱい逃げ回って、ここにたどり着いたクポ。
この場所は、ヒトも少ないから、
落ち着いて魔法をかけ直してたクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_052<tab>It was absolutely awful. I've never been so embarrassed.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_052まったくもう、ヒトに姿を見られちゃうなんて、
モーグリ失格クポ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_053<tab>Now, now, my little moogleypoo. We had no way of knowing what to expect when we got here.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_053うう、ごめんなさいクポ……。
モグたちのデートが、
そんなに大変なことになっていたなんて、知らなかったクポ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_054<tab>I think we'll be fine now, but we really should go and speak with the owner here. Mister Manderville, I think his name was. It may be best if you accompany us, kupo. Lest we cause another unwanted surprise.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_054その支配人さんに、謝りにいきたいから、
冒険者さん、説明をお手伝いしてくれないクポ？
モグたちが急に姿を現したら、きっとびっくりしちゃうクポ。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_055<tab>I bet he's back at the entrance, apologizing to his poor guests. Let's hurry and set things straight.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_055支配人の「ゴッドベルト」さんは、
「エントランススクウェア」にいるクポね？
先に行くから、ついてきてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_060<tab>You are returned. With some clue as to the source of our troubles, I should hope.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_060)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
不審な物体の、手がかりは見つかりましたかな？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_061<tab>Ahem. I believe we are the source of the distress you speak of, sir.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_061支配人さん！
モグたちの話を、聞いてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_062<tab>Moogles! My, what a most unexpected surprise. Let me have a better look at you.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_062ホホウ！？　こちらは、本物のモーグリ族……！？
初めてお目にかかりますぞ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_063<tab>Simply marvelous! Milky white fur like pearls, with forms as perfectly round. And your poms. They glow like crimson jewels, yet they seem so soft. If I may, would you permit me to inspect them more closely?
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_063白くて丸い、なんと魅力的なフォルム！
彫金師としての創作意欲と、大胸筋がうずきますぞ……！
ひとまず、モフモフさせていただいてよろしいですかな！？

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_064<tab>I would much prefer that you didn't, kupo...
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_064も、モフモフはご遠慮したいクポ……。
モグたち、あなたにお話があるクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_065<tab>This adventurer told us of the confusion we unwittingly caused, and we came to apologize.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_065この冒険者さんから、
モグのせいで大騒ぎになってたって、教えてもらったクポ。
お騒がせして、ごめんなさいクポ……。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_066<tab>I see! You are the spirits that allegedly haunt the halls of the Gold Saucer. Knowing now the source of the problem, we need only look around us to see the solution.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_066なるほど、白い謎の物体とは、あなたたちのことだったのですな！
ご心配はいりません。
原因がわかりさえすれば、こちらとしては問題ありませんぞ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_067<tab>The likeness of moogles is a common sight here in the Gold Saucer. To say your presence was requested as part of the festival should more than suffice to explain what was seen here today.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_067お客様には、フェスティバルの演出の一環だったのだと、
ご説明しておきましょう！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_068<tab>Misunderstandings aside, it is an honor to have you as guests.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_068それよりなにより、モーグリ族にも、
このゴールドソーサーに遊びにきていただけるなんて、
オーナーとして光栄の極み！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_069<tab>I will inform the staff, and see to it you are able to make use of our facilities even should you choose not to reveal yourselves to anyone else.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_069おふたりが、姿を消したままでも普通にご利用いただけるよう、
従業員にも話を通しておきましょうぞ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_070<tab>Thank you, Mister Manderville, thank you! At last, another chance to woo─Ahem. To work on my aim at the monster toss. Yes, that's it, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_070それはありがたいクポ！
お嬢さんモーグリに情けないって言われちゃったから、
もう一回デートにお誘いしてみるクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_071<tab>Before that, though, I have a favor to ask of you. If it's not too much trouble, of course.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_071モグの姿を見ることができる冒険者さんには、
お願いしたいことがあるクポ。
あとで、またお話を聞いてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_072<tab>I shall leave you three to your merrymaking, then. The staff must be made aware of our special guests.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_072私は、お先に失礼いたしますぞ！
「特設景品交換窓口」の従業員らに、
事態収拾の旨を、伝えてこなくてはなりませんのでな！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_073<tab>Pray, enjoy the delights of the Gold Saucer to your hearts' content.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GODBERT_000_073皆様は、どうぞごゆるりと、
ゴールドソーサー・フェスティバルをお楽しみください！
ホッホッホーーーウ！

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_074<tab>You can now purchase seasonal items from the campaign attendant. Please note that you will be unable to do so after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_SYSTEM_000_074「特設景品交換窓口」が開放されました！
シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、ご利用いただけます。
期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_080<tab>We won't reveal ourselves until we're absolutely sure it's safe. We don't want any more trouble.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_GIRLMOOGLE03133_000_080ゴッドベルトさんには、姿を現して謝るけど、
それまでは、なるべく姿を見られないようにしたいクポ。
姿を消す魔法を解くタイミングが重要クポね。

source: TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_081<tab>He's certainly an imposing figure, isn't he? I hope he isn't cross with us, kupo.
target:
TEXT_FESGSC201_03133_YOUNGMOOGLE03133_000_081あのヒトが支配人さんクポ……？
ちょっと怖そうな見た目をしてるクポ。
いっぱい怒られたらどうしようクポ……。
